attributes.action: immediately remove our judges from the sentencing process, once guilt or innocence is decided by a jury.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If any more evidence were needed to prove how out of touch with reality our judges are, just take a look at the case where a millionaire took on 3 masked burglars who were caught in his house, and ended up being jailed.  Our judges are SO out of touch with reality, it is embarrassing to right thinking people.  They need to be removed from the sentencing process at the earliest opportunity.
